Security oriented blog

From Wordpress to Jekyll

18 Nov 2014

I've finally taken the step from Wordpress till Jekyll, having it hosted on Github. Works great, though in the future weeks the page may be a bit messy at times having me setting it all up.

Never used Jekyll? Give it a try, as the page are all static there's almost no security concerns, in compare with Wordpress having a php and database environment to hold in check.
